nodes.text: Davin DeWitt was a male Human, who lived on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic.

DeWitt was the Baron Administrator of the platform city Bayonard. In about 32 BBY, his daughter, Selima DeWitt, went missing and Davin became determined to find her. He sent the messenger Brian to collect the heroes of Cularin and bring them to see him, in his house on Bayonard He then explained to the heroes the details about his daughter's' disappearance and then hired them to find her and ask her to come back.
